allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Tasker task management application

Features:
- Electron-based desktop application for Windows/MacOS
- File-based task storage (Markdown files)
- Hierarchical task organization with drag-and-drop
- Multi-folder support for organizing different projects
- Task filtering (priority, completion, due dates)
- Task sorting (priority, due date, creation date)
- Metrics dashboard showing task statistics
- Ollama AI integration for task assistance
- Customizable quick prompts for AI agent
- Light/dark theme support with auto-detection
- System tray integration
- Global hotkey for quick task addition (Ctrl+Alt+T)
- Auto-launch on Windows startup
- Resizable sidebar
- Expand/collapse task hierarchies

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add task management enhancements and UI improvements

- Fix sidebar overflow: Add CSS min-width constraints and text-overflow handling to prevent content from extending beyond sidebar when resized narrow
- Implement Ctrl+click permanent delete: Hold Ctrl while clicking delete to permanently remove tasks and all children without confirmation
- Add radioactive yellow delete button: Show delete_forever icon with yellow (#FFD700) background and glow effect when Ctrl is pressed, providing clear visual warning for permanent deletion
- Add date indicators: Display calendar icon on tasks with due dates, showing both due date and created date on hover
- Highlight past-due tasks: Red calendar icon for tasks past their due date (excluding completed tasks)
- Update help modal: Document Ctrl+click permanent delete keyboard shortcut
- Migrate agent UI: Convert quick prompts from dropdown to menu interface with better UX
- Add model name display: Show selected Ollama model in agent header

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add git timeline visualization and system theme-aware tray icon

Timeline Features:
- Visual timeline ribbon at bottom of tasks view for folders with version control
- Timeline displays commits as interactive points on horizontal timeline
- Commits positioned proportionally based on timestamps (oldest left, newest right)
- First commit highlighted in green to mark repository beginning
- Hover tooltips show commit messages for quick preview
- Click timeline points to open detailed commit modal (hash, author, date, message)
- Ctrl+Wheel zoom support for timeline (50% to 2000% range)
- Timeline zoom level persists to config
- Automatic timeline updates after task changes

Timeline Positioning and Rendering:
- Absolute pixel positioning with padding to prevent edge clipping
- Dynamic width calculation based on zoom level and commit density
- Commits spaced proportionally by time for accurate historical visualization
- Global fixed-position tooltip prevents clipping issues

Rollback Feature:
- Click timeline point to view commit details and rollback option
- Rollback restores tasks to exact state at selected commit
- Warning modal explains destructive nature of rollback
- After rollback, later commits preserved in git reflog

Help Documentation:
- Comprehensive help section for version control features
- Automatic commits documentation (what triggers commits)
- Timeline usage guide (hover, click, zoom controls)
- Rollback feature explanation and warnings
- Keyboard shortcut documentation for Ctrl+Wheel zoom

System Tray Improvements:
- Tray icon now theme-aware based on system theme
- Uses white icon (tasks-dark.png) on dark Windows themes
- Uses black icon (tasks.png) on light Windows themes
- Automatically updates icon when system theme changes
- Independent of app theme setting - always follows system

Technical Implementation:
- Store timeline commits in state for zoom operations
- Debug logging for timeline rendering (commit order, time ranges)
- System theme detection using nativeTheme.shouldUseDarkColors
- nativeTheme ''updated'' listener for dynamic tray icon updates
- Increased max zoom from 5x to 20x for better commit separation visibility

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive keyboard navigation system

Navigation Features:
- Arrow Up/Down: Navigate between tasks vertically with wraparound
- Arrow Left/Right: Navigate between Kanban columns (Kanban view only)
- Space: Expand/collapse selected task (if it has children)
- Enter: Open detail dialog for selected task
- Delete: Soft delete selected task (move to deleted folder)
- Ctrl+Delete: Permanently delete selected task and all children

View Switching:
- Ctrl+K: Switch to Kanban view
- Ctrl+L: Switch to List view

Folder Switching:
- Ctrl+1-9: Switch to folder 1-9 (works anywhere in app)

Visual Feedback:
- Selected task highlighted with blue border and shadow
- Smooth scrolling to keep selected task visible
- Works in both List and Kanban views
- Auto-selects first task when entering Tasks view

Technical Implementation:
- Fixed Windows path compatibility: escape backslashes in CSS selectors
- Use event capture phase for keyboard handlers to prevent conflicts
- Clear selection when switching folders
- Prevent keyboard shortcuts when typing in input fields
- Support both Ctrl (Windows/Linux) and Cmd (Mac) modifiers

Help Documentation:
- Added Window Controls section with snap and tray shortcuts
- Added View Switching section (Ctrl+K/L)
- Added Folder Switching section (Ctrl+1-9)
- Added Task Navigation section with all keyboard shortcuts
- Updated keyboard shortcut reference in Help view

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
